name: D8GN
description:
D8GN (Pronounced *like* D8ungeon) is a demake of the famous Dicey Dungeons for the elderly Chip8 console.

It has received a few upgrades thanks to Octo and the XO-CHIP, thanks to that I can show you this in all its 4 color glory.

Credits
  • John Earnest (Octo)
  • Matthew Welch (Tiny Font)
  • #octo-jam-7 (Listening to me rubber duck debug)
